title: (x) 'Type for you' sans - Sun {Stephen}
content:

 [‹ Haier geometric sans logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29446 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Community - Neue Helvetica 43 Ext {Ben Archer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29445 "Go to next forum topic")
author: spirelli

comments.content:
Am sure u wanted to ask something else..but this is what i got when i hit the link...so i just answered that:-) ..check your link.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/forbidden_5484.jpg)

I think it’s Times New Roman dude, georgia has old-style figures ;)  
sorry if I missed a joke

—N

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/header_type2_3778.gif)

^ Original image.  
_( [typeforyou.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827/http:/typeforyou.blogspot.com/))_

And yea, the error message appears to be ’Times New Roman’, but this would also depend on your personal preferences when browsing the web. :)

Dav
Linotype’s Cisalpin seems to come pretty close, but it’s not a perfect match...

Satya, you need to get your default fonts straight.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture3_6241.png)
